 I've attached =
2 word documents to correspond to my 3 tsuba for the 2016 KTK catalog. As I=
 have never done this before. I would appreciate your comments before they =
go to Nick. I've also attached a photo of the Hosokawa Sansai tsuba that I =
reference in my article about the same' tsuba. I know that you mentioned th=
at Nick might have an issue with including it, but I think that it would ad=
d value to the description. 

 Regards,
 Chuck Granick
